desc: Draws a rectangle on the screen.

args.name: x
args.desc: The top-left x position of the rectangle.

args.name: y
args.desc: The top-left y position of the rectangle.

args.name: l
args.desc: (false/nil) The rectangle will be filled, (true) The rectangle will have only lines (border).

args.name: c
args.desc: The color of the rectangle (0-15), defaults to the active color.

note: The arguments can be passed in a table
